overview: Kyle spent the last 10 years in Seattle designing and building large scale software systems focusing on travel, payment processing, search and quantitative futures trading. He recently designed and built a modern cabin in the North Cascades Mountains, where he now lives with his wife and dog. They survived their first winter in Mazama with over 15 feet of snow, and they are extremely excited to use Tastemaker to turn their home into a masterpiece. Kyle studied computer science and engineering at Dartmouth College.
